purpose: Enables Hyprland Wayland compositor with XDG portals and GTK themes.
integration_points: Sets Wayland preference for Electron apps
notes: This environment module sets up Hyprland as the Wayland compositor, configures XDG desktop portals for screen sharing and file pickers, forces Ozone Wayland for apps, sets the default session, and applies GTK themes system-wide. Reasoning: Provides a complete Wayland desktop environment with proper integration for modern applications and consistent theming.
